enb_long_title: Sixth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: Bo Kjellén (Sweden), Co-Chair of the contact group on UNFCCC Article 4.8 and 4.9 and Protocol Article 3.14 (adverse effects), said progress had been made in recent consultations, in particular on Article 4.9, following the outcome of a workshop for LDCs.
